TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceProvider

summary.span: 定義類別必須實作的介面，以用來做為資源提供者。

span.span: Defines the interface a class must implement to act as a resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源提供者有助於擷取的資源檔中的值。A resource provider facilitates the retrieving of values from a resource file. 當表單的運算式`<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>`遇到頁面剖析期間，資源提供者會傳回資源的當地語系化的值。When an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: classKey, resourceKey %>` is encountered during page parsing, the resource provider returns the localized value for the resource. 類別建立的執行個體物件以用於擷取的值。The class creates instances of objects for use in retrieving the values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站，用來擷取快取的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 資源提供者 factory 建立可實作類別的執行個體。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a class that implements . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetObject (string resourceKey, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(string resourceKey, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function GetObject (resourceKey As String, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetObject(System::String ^ resourceKey, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member GetObject : string * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

param.name: resourceKey
param.span: 識別特定資源的索引鍵。

span.span: The key identifying a particular resource.

param.name: culture
param.span: 識別資源的當地語系化值之文化特性。

span.span: The culture identifying a localized value for the resource.

summary.span: 傳回索引鍵和文化特性的資源物件。

span.span: Returns a resource object for the key and culture.
An that contains the resource value for the and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，方法會傳回目前的文化特性為基礎的資源索引鍵的當地語系化的值。When implemented, the method returns the localized value for a resource key based on the current culture. 實作的類別可以擷取屬性的值如果`culture`未傳遞參數。The implementing class could retrieve the property if a value for the `culture` parameter is not passed in. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站，用來擷取快取的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 資源提供者 factory 建立自訂的資源提供者實作的執行個體。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 資源提供者也包含自訂方法。The resource provider includes a customized method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResourceReader As IResourceReader
public: property System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ ResourceReader { System::Resources::IResourceReader ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得從來源讀取資源值的物件。

span.span: Gets an object to read resource values from a source.

value.span: 與目前資源提供者相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with the current resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件從來源讀取循序的名稱/值組。An object reads sequential name/value pairs from a source. 並類別會提供預設分別介面來讀取和.resx 檔案的實作。The and classes provide default interface implementation for reading from .resources and .resx files, respectively. 其他實作介面可以從任何包含資源值的來源讀取。Other implementations of the interface could read from any source containing resource values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範自訂的資源提供者處理站，用來擷取快取的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. 資源提供者 factory 建立自訂的資源提供者實作的執行個體。The resource provider factory creates an instance of a customized resource provider that implements . 資源提供者也包含自訂屬性。The resource provider includes a customized property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
